entry.value: # Copy input to output%%00010# GUI to specify the cosolvent%%00010import tkinter as tk%%00010import pandas as pd%%00010import os%%00010%%00010# initialize data of lists. The default is Ethanol%%00010data = {%%00010%%00009%%00009'cosolvent': ['Ethanol'],%%00010%%00009%%00009'mole_fraction': ['0.5']%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010df = pd.DataFrame(data)%%00010%%00010%%00010entries = []%%00010root = tk.Tk()%%00010root.title("Specify Cosolvent")%%00010cvs = tk.Canvas(root, width=400, height=400, relief='raised')%%00010cvs.pack()%%00010# GUI to view and modify parameters, and store them into the dataframe (df)%%00010pointer = 25%%00010%%00010texts = ['specify cosolvent','mole fraction of cosolvent']%%00010%%00010for i in range(2):%%00010 label = tk.Label(root, text=texts[i])%%00010 label.config(font=('helvetica', 12))%%00010 cvs.create_window(200, pointer, window=label)%%00010 pointer += 25%%00010 dv = tk.StringVar() # default value%%00010 dv.set(df.loc[0, df.columns[i]])%%00010 entry = tk.Entry(root, textvariable=dv, font=('helvetica', 12))%%00010 cvs.create_window(200, pointer, window=entry)%%00010 entries.append(entry)%%00010 pointer += 50%%00010%%00010def printer():%%00010 for i in range(len(entries)):%%00010 entry = entries[i]%%00010 df.loc[0, df.columns[i]] = entry.get()%%00010 root.destroy()%%00010%%00010button = tk.Button(text='Submit & Continue', command=printer, font=('helvetica', 12))%%00010cvs.create_window(200, pointer, window=button)%%00010%%00010root.mainloop()%%00010cosolvent = df.loc[0, 'cosolvent']%%00010mole_fraction = df.loc[0, 'mole_fraction']%%00010%%00010%%00010# filter the data table using the entered cosolvent%%00010table1 = input_table_1.copy()%%00010value_list = [cosolvent]%%00010%%00010boolean_series = table1.cosolvent.isin(value_list)%%00010filtered_table = table1[boolean_series]%%00010Index = filtered_table.index.values[0]%%00010filtered_table.rename(index={Index: 'Row0'}, inplace=True)%%00010filtered_table.loc['Row0', 'mole_fraction'] = mole_fraction%%00010%%00010table2 = input_table_2.copy()%%00010%%00010output_table_1 = pd.concat([filtered_table, table2], axis = 1)%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010
